designer module

designer.designer()[source]
designer.draw_neural_net(ax, left, right, bottom, top, layer_sizes)[source]

Draw a neural network cartoon using matplotlib.

Parameters:

  • ax – matplotlib Axes object

  • left – float, the center of the leftmost node(s) will be placed here

  • right – float, the center of the rightmost node(s) will be placed here

  • bottom – float, the center of the bottommost node(s) will be placed here

  • top – float, the center of the topmost node(s) will be placed here

  • layer_sizes – list of int, list containing the number of nodes in each layer

designer.draw_updated_neural_net(ax, left, right, bottom, top, input_size, hidden_sizes, output_size)[source]

Draw an updated neural network cartoon using matplotlib.

Parameters:

  • ax – matplotlib Axes object

  • left – float, the center of the leftmost node(s) will be placed here

  • right – float, the center of the rightmost node(s) will be placed here

  • bottom – float, the center of the bottommost node(s) will be placed here

  • top – float, the center of the topmost node(s) will be placed here

  • input_size – int, number of nodes in the input layer

  • hidden_sizes – list of int, list containing the number of nodes in each hidden layer

  • output_size – int, number of nodes in the output layer
